word: I have faithfully written out the warnings that God has given me. They have been printed in books, yet I cannot forbear. I must write these same things over and over. I ask not to be relieved. As long as the Lord spares my life, I must continue to bear these earnest messages.--Ms 21, 1910, p. 3. ("A Call to Labor in the Great Cities," June 22, 1910.)
